00009 ORTrigger32ShaperTreeWriter::ORTrigger32ShaperTreeWriter(string treeBaseName)
00010 {
00011   string treeName = treeBaseName + "1Tree";
00012   fTriggerGTID1TreeWriter = new ORTrigger32GTIDTreeWriter(&fTriggerGTID1Decoder, treeName);
00013   fTriggerGTID1TreeWriter->SetThisProcessorAutoFillsTree(true);
00014   fTriggerGTID1TreeWriter->SetFillMethod(ORVTreeWriter::kFillBeforeProcessDataRecord);
00015   AddProcessor(fTriggerGTID1TreeWriter);
00016   fTrigger1ClockTreeWriter = new ORTrigger32ClockTreeWriter(treeName);
00017   fTrigger1ClockTreeWriter->SetThisProcessorAutoFillsTree(false);
00018   fTrigger1ClockTreeWriter->SetTriggerBitsFilter(ORTrigger32ClockTreeWriter::kTrigger1); 
00019   AddProcessor(fTrigger1ClockTreeWriter);
00020 //Shaper record is trigger 2 event.
00021   treeName = treeBaseName + "2Tree";
00022   fTriggerGTID2TreeWriter = new ORTrigger32GTIDTreeWriter(&fTriggerGTID2Decoder, treeName);
00023   fTriggerGTID2TreeWriter->SetThisProcessorAutoFillsTree(false);
00024   AddProcessor(fTriggerGTID2TreeWriter);
00025   fTrigger2ClockTreeWriter = new ORTrigger32ClockTreeWriter(treeName);
00026   fTrigger2ClockTreeWriter->SetThisProcessorAutoFillsTree(false);
00027   fTrigger2ClockTreeWriter->SetTriggerBitsFilter(ORTrigger32ClockTreeWriter::kTrigger2); 
00028   AddProcessor(fTrigger2ClockTreeWriter);
00029   fshaperShaperTreeWriter = new ORShaperShaperTreeWriter(treeName);
00030   fshaperShaperTreeWriter->SetThisProcessorAutoFillsTree(true);
00031   fshaperShaperTreeWriter->SetFillMethod(ORVTreeWriter::kFillAfterProcessDataRecord);
00032   AddProcessor(fshaperShaperTreeWriter);
00033   //Live Time Records
00034   treeName = treeBaseName + "LTTree";
00035   fTriggerLiveTimeTreeWriter = new ORBasicTreeWriter(&fTriggerLiveTimeDecoder, treeName);
00036   AddProcessor(fTriggerLiveTimeTreeWriter);
00037 }

00040 {
00041   for(size_t i=0; i < fDataProcessors.size(); i++) {
